entry.title: 'cause being your punchline still is something
entry.summary:
Author: whiry

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,043Chapters: 8/21Kudos: 115

Summary: Born into a world of the supernatural and forced to segregate himself and his human peers from the supernatural creatures that inhabit Beacon Hills, Stiles grew up with the belief that integration was the key to a better life, thanks to his mother’s social work. Of course, that belief is only furthered by the mate mark he bears of his mate’s first words to him, something only supernatural creatures and their occasional human mates are supposed to have. Desperate to find his mate and carry on his mother’s work after her death, Stiles does everything in his power to unite his town, even if that means enduring dinners with Derek Hale, who hates him and refuses to speak to him. After a terse interaction, Derek finally speaks and the two realize they’re mates. Well, surely Stiles can still get his happy ending. Right?

Author: StarStruckFears

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,130Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Stiles was a monster, his mother had said so, screamed it even. So he does the only thing he can to save his parents from the monster he is. Stiles runs and finds a new home, one of death, one deserving of a monster. Aka Stiles is raised by the Argents and is sent with Allison to finish the mission Kate had failed to complete. Though neither hunter had expected to get so attached to the pack of monsters they are trained to kill.

entry.title: You’re Safe, I’m Here
entry.summary:
Author: Joy_peace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,315Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 8

Summary: The Beacon Hills Preserve had always been quiet in the early evenings, the kind of quiet that hummed in the bones of anyone supernatural. Most people would call it peaceful. Liam Dunbar called it suspicious. He walked a few steps ahead, his eyes flicking between the trees, inhaling like he expected to catch a threat in the damp leaves or the wind. His shoulders were coiled tight—too tight for a patrol that was supposed to be routine. The sun hovered low enough to stain the whole forest with orange and copper. Behind him, Theo Raeken let out a slow, theatrical sigh. “Dunbar,” he said, voice low but full of a patience he very smugly claimed he didn’t have, “you’re clenching your jaw so hard I can hear your molars trying to fuse.”

entry.title: Red Is Pretty (But So Is Blue)
entry.summary:
Author: sugareey

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,435Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 161

Summary: Happily ever afters don’t happen to people like Stiles. He knows he should be grateful that he even has a heartstring to begin with. But it’s been cold and dormant for so long. What good will come out of having a soulmate now—one who has basically ignored Stiles’ existence for ages? What could Stiles possibly need from a person like that anyway? * [Or: It’s only when Stiles starts singing love songs on stage that the Pack discovers his long-time hobby. This also forces him to learn what it really means to follow his heart.]

entry.title: A Borrowed Sky
entry.summary:
Author: 1223rhys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,735Chapters: 14/23Kudos: 98

Summary: He thought he could outrun his past. After a shootout leaves his gang scattered and the law on his heels, Derek slips into another man’s life—marriage offer and all. But he didn’t expect Stiles: clever, stubborn, and heartbreakingly sincere. And when the past catches up, Derek will have to choose what kind of man he really is—the one he left behind, or the one he’s pretending to be. Marriage was part of the plan. Falling in love wasn’t.

entry.title: A Tether in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: ReadNowSleepLater

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,278Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 82

Summary: Stiles Stilinski never meant to become a myth. After the fall of his pack and the fading of Beacon Hills’ magic, he runs – straight into a world older, darker, and far more complicated than he ever imagined. Mystic Falls is supposed to be a quiet place to start over, to ground himself again. Instead, it becomes the center of a storm he didn’t know was waiting for him. Drawn into the tangled lives of the Mikaelsons, Stiles finds unexpected warmth among immortals who should’ve terrified him – and something dangerously close to belonging. Between Elijah’s steady grace, Kol’s mischief, Klaus’ possessive charm, and Peter’s return from the shadows, he starts to build something new: a family stitched together by chaos, magic, and a kind of love that defies logic. But magic never lets go without a fight, and neither do old bonds. When ghosts from his past and creatures from the dark rise to claim him, Stiles has to face what it truly means to be an anchor – and what, and who, he’s willing to tether himself to. Because in the end, even in the dark, someone always reaches back.

entry.title: Blood and Ashes
entry.summary:
Author: lavieboheme0919

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 83,938Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 46

Summary: Several centuries after the Last Battle, the White Tower stands taller than ever—rebuilt, restructured, and reeling from new threats that no one dares name aloud. Saidin has returned, cleansed and chaotic, and the Hall of the Tower seeks control more than balance. When Stiles—a powerful male channeler raised to Aes Sedai—survives a narrow vote in the Hall for flouting Tower law and custom, he’s spared gentling… but not punishment.Bound without consent to Sitters from opposing Ajahs, declared the first Striker since the Age of Legends, Stiles finds himself weaponized by a Tower that fears what it cannot command. But Stiles is not their dog to tame, and the Tower is not as united as it pretends to be. As ancient tensions simmer and forgotten enemies stir, bonds—both sacred and profane—will be tested.This is not the story of the Dragon. This is what comes after.Power without trust. Bonds without love. And one man who will burn down the Pattern before letting them leash him again.Note: There will be some AI-generated art for an important moment from each chapter at the end of each chapter.

entry.title: I Wanna Be Yours
entry.summary:
Author: Taintedtricked

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,658Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 33

Summary: Stiles never meant to fall for Derek Hale — the brooding, half-feral werewolf who grunts more than he talks and looks at him like he’s both a headache and a heartbeat. But somewhere between burnt coffee, pack crises, and late nights spent patching each other up, Stiles realizes he doesn’t just want to be in Derek’s orbit — he wants to be his. Derek’s spent his life building walls so no one can get close enough to hurt him again. But Stiles is persistent, sunlight in human form, and Derek’s starting to wonder if maybe it’s okay to want warmth. Secrets held too long begin to unravel, and somewhere between the noise and the silence, they find it — the quiet truth neither of them can ignore. “Maybe I just wanna be yours.” A slow-burn Sterek story inspired by I Wanna Be Yours by Arctic Monkeys — all coffee, comfort, and confessions you never meant to say out loud.

entry.title: The Bonds that Bind
entry.summary:
Author: applejuice382

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 250,811Chapters: 19/24Kudos: 1,129

Summary: Stiles is just trying to prevent the next supernatural problem from killing his friends. Derek is just trying to keep his pack alive (and ignore the desperation that crawls under his skin whenever Stiles is near). When Stiles goes into the preserve to investigate a string of murders, he and Derek are kidnapped by an unknown group and locked in a basement with no escape. Each night brings new suffering, and each day they have only each other. The two will have to learn how to lean on one another to keep their sanity intact, and they’ll have to work together to escape. Too bad they annoy the shit out of each other.
